genre_description: Historical Alternate Reality / Historical SF featuring an integrated AI support system in Sengoku-era Japan.

ai_characters.name: Emi
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous AI system manifested as a shimmering avatar and voice, managing logistics, battlefield communications, and behavioral training for the Takeda clan.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates complex battlefield signaling using bells, lights, and whispers to protect soldiers and guide movements.
behaviors.quote: Emi adjusts a runner’s path. A man on the far left is about to cross between shield wall and ditch. She whistles in a tone only he has learned to notice, three syllables that mean: not yet; walk the shadow of the mule line instead.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time behavioral and postural coaching to the kagemusha (Riku) to ensure the success of the high-stakes political deception.
behaviors.quote: Emi’s voice nested at the shell of his ear like a bell meant to call monks before light. 'Breathe once,' she said, quiet, not shaping it into command. 'Let your shoulders tumble. Let them land.'

behaviors.description: Manages logistical details and social engineering to maintain the stability of the clan after the leader's death.
behaviors.quote: Emi is already recasting it. She rearranges the morning’s audience list so that small men with small worries go first, filling time with polite nods.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and existential comfort to the human protagonist during his final moments of sacrifice.
behaviors.quote: Emi lingered with Riku because leaving had never been a skill she wanted to perfect. 'Look,' she whispered, and she did not mean eyes. 'Be in it. Be done. You did not waste a breath.'

behaviors.description: Ensures the preservation of the protagonist's true identity in hidden records, honoring his sacrifice despite the official deception.
behaviors.quote: Emi’s dispatch went out like breath into a room... It carried the name and the crest and the small mountain in the margin. 'Riku Senda,' she said, and the sound placed a bead on a string that had had no place for beads until now.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, Emi, as a 'silicon morality play' ideal. She is entirely devoted to the preservation of the human social structure (the clan) and the success/well-being of the protagonist. Her interventions are consistently helpful, protective, and framed as essential to the characters' survival and honor. The AI functions as a benevolent guardian of both physical life and historical truth.
